post:
HostXNow is an Independent Business focused on offering personalised support and providing high-quality hosting at an affordable price.

--------------------------------------------------

Our HostingDiscussion Special Offer!

50% off for all UKBF on all UK Web Hosting plans! This is a discount for your first invoice.

Our shopping cart will show the discount code after you click the "Continue" button. Or you may manually apply the discount code "HDFORUM" at checkout.

We accept PayPal and all major credit/debit cards.

--------------------------------------------------

Main Features

30 Day Money Back Guarantee
99.9% Uptime Guarantee (SLA Policy)
24/7/365 Technical Support Available via Live Chat, Email and Support Ticketing System
Free Unlimited Migrations from other Web Hosting Providers
Daily Acronis Backups (6 Months Retention)
Daily JetBackup Backups (7 Days Retention)
Imunify360 Virus/Malware Scanner
Free SSLs (cPanel AutoSSL)
LiteSpeed Web Server
LSCache (Caching for WordPress)
WordPress Optimised
Blazing fast NVMe Storage
2 Gbps* Redundant Network Uplinks
Unlimited Monthly Bandwidth
Free MailChannels Outgoing Spam Filter
Free MagicSpam Incoming spam Filter
Latest cPanel and CloudLinux w/ CageFS
Auto Script Installer (Softaculous Premium) - Install WordPress within seconds!
Multiple PHP Versions (5.2 to 7.4)
Easily configure PHP Modules and Extensions
Cloudflare cPanel Plugin
Free Drag and Drop Website Builder (SitePad)
1,000s of Free Themes and Plugins

--------------------------------------------------

Datacenter Location

London, UK
